CustomField.description: Total adjustment is the sum of week 1 to week 14 adjustment %
CustomField.formula: (Week1_Ramp__c + Week2_Ramp__c + Week3_Ramp__c + Week4_Ramp__c + Week5_Ramp__c + Week6_Ramp__c + Week7_Ramp__c + Week8_Ramp__c + Week9_Ramp__c + Week10_Ramp__c + Week11_Ramp__c + Week12_Ramp__c + Week13_Ramp__c + Week14_Ramp__c)*100
CustomField.label: Total Adjustment
